baseConfig.title: Base Configuration
baseConfig.restoreConfirm:
Are you sure you want to restore the default values for base configuration?

This operation will only reset the input items on the current page and will not be saved immediately.
baseConfig.restoreSuccess: All default values have been restored (not saved)
baseConfig.autoStartHint: When enabled, the application will automatically start when you log in to the system.
baseConfig.showRealtimeLogsHint: When disabled, logs will not be pushed to the interface in real-time (they will still be cached in the background and can be viewed manually).
baseConfig.realtimeLogsOnlyErrorsHint: When enabled, only error-related logs will be pushed in real-time, reducing UI/log overhead under high concurrency.
baseConfig.streamProxyHint: When disabled, requests/responses will be read in chunks in memory, which may consume more memory.
baseConfig.maxBodySizeMBHint: Only effective when stream forwarding is disabled; requests exceeding this size will be rejected.
baseConfig.maxResponseBodySizeMBHint: Only effective when stream forwarding is disabled; responses exceeding this size will be rejected.
baseConfig.enableHttp2Hint: When disabled, upstream requests will be forced to use HTTP/1.1.
baseConfig.compressionEnabledHint: When enabled, eligible responses will be compressed to reduce data transfer.
baseConfig.compressionGzipLevelHint: Higher level means better compression but more CPU usage. Recommended: 6 (balanced).
baseConfig.compressionBrotliHint: Enable Brotli compression algorithm (better compression ratio but higher CPU usage).
baseConfig.compressionBrotliLevelHint: Higher level means better compression but more CPU usage. Recommended: 6 (balanced).

app.title: Reverse Proxy Management Panel
app.saveConfigHint: Please stop the service before saving configuration
app.autoThemeDisabled: Auto theme switching disabled, currently in manual mode
app.confirmQuit:
Are you sure you want to quit SSLProxyManager?

After quitting, the proxy service will stop running.
app.configSaved: Configuration saved, restarting service to apply new configuration...
app.startRequestSent: Start request sent, waiting for service to enter running state...
app.serverStartErrorWithException: Service start failed, but frontend prompt exception: {error}

terms.readAndAgree: I have read and agree to the above Terms of Use and Disclaimer

terms.pleaseCheckAgree: Please check the agree option first

Are you sure you want to quit?
terms.content:
SSLProxyManager Terms of Use and Disclaimer

1. Software Nature
SSLProxyManager is a general-purpose reverse proxy management tool that provides legitimate functions such as network proxying, load balancing, and content distribution. This software is a general-purpose tool with various legitimate uses and is not specifically designed for any illegal purposes.

2. Legitimate Use
You must ensure that your use of this software complies with the following requirements: comply with local laws, regulations, and relevant network service terms; use only on devices/networks you own or have authorization for; not use for any unauthorized network attacks, data theft, fraud, or other illegal purposes; not use to bypass access controls, violate others' privacy, or engage in other illegal or non-compliant activities; not use to spread malware, conduct network attacks, or damage network security.

3. Prohibited Uses
Strictly prohibited uses of this software include: unauthorized network attacks (such as DDoS, man-in-the-middle attacks, etc.); data theft or privacy violations; fraudulent activities (such as phishing websites, content tampering for fraud, etc.); bypassing access controls (unauthorized); spreading malware; infringing intellectual property rights (such as unauthorized content modification, pirated distribution, etc.); any other illegal or non-compliant uses.

4. Disclaimer
This software is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties (including but not limited to fitness for purpose, reliability, accuracy, availability, freedom from errors/vulnerabilities, etc.). The authors and contributors shall not be liable for any direct or indirect losses (including but not limited to loss of profits, data loss, business interruption, equipment or system damage, etc.) arising from the use or inability to use this software. Any legal liability, administrative penalties, third-party claims, and related consequences arising from your use of this software for illegal, non-compliant, or unauthorized activities shall be borne solely by you, and the authors and contributors shall not be liable.

5. User Responsibility
You are responsible for evaluating and bearing all risks and responsibilities when using this software. Please ensure that your use complies with local laws, regulations, and relevant network service terms. If you do not agree to the above terms, please do not use, distribute, or develop based on this project.

6. License
This software is licensed under the MIT License. By using this software, you agree to comply with the terms of the MIT License. For details, please refer to the LICENSE file.

7. Special Notice
⚠️ Important: This software includes features such as response body modification, which can be used for legitimate purposes (such as content customization, ad filtering, etc.), but please ensure: use only on devices/networks you own or have authorization for; not use for fraud, phishing, or other illegal purposes; comply with relevant laws, regulations, and website service terms; any legal liability arising from illegal use shall be borne by the user.

configCard.listenAddrPlaceholder: Enter listen address and press Enter to add
configCard.noMatchText: No match found, you can enter and press Enter to add directly
configCard.title: Proxy Configuration
configCard.hostPlaceholder: Host matching not implemented; to modify upstream Host, set it in proxy_set_header
configCard.followRedirectsHint: On: Proxy follows upstream 30x and returns final response (client usually won't redirect); Off: Returns 30x directly to client (browser will auto redirect). Recommended off for website reverse proxy, on for API if needed
configCard.staticDirHint: Serve static files first, fallback to upstream server if not found
configCard.excludeBasicAuthHint: When checked, this route will skip Basic Auth verification
configCard.urlRewriteHint: Use regular expressions to match URLs, supports capture groups like $1, $2. Example: ^/api/(.*)$ replace with /v1/$1
configCard.requestBodyReplaceHint: Replace text in request body, supports regular expressions. Only effective for text-type request bodies.
configCard.legalWarningContent: Response body modification can be used for legitimate purposes (such as content customization, ad filtering, etc.), but please ensure:
configCard.legalWarningItem1: Only use on devices/networks you own or have authorization for
configCard.legalWarningItem2: Not used for fraud, phishing, or other illegal purposes
configCard.legalWarningItem3: Comply with relevant laws, regulations, and website service terms
configCard.legalWarningItem4: Any legal liability arising from illegal use shall be borne by the user
configCard.responseBodyReplaceHint: Replace text in response body, supports regular expressions. Only effective for text-type response bodies.
configCard.removeHeadersHint: Specify Header names to remove from requests and responses.
configCard.forwardBasicAuthHeader: Forward Basic Auth header to upstream server
configCard.forwardBasicAuthHeaderHint: By default not forwarded to avoid affecting backend API authentication (e.g., JWT, OAuth, etc.)
configCard.rateLimitHint: Limit request frequency by IP to prevent DDoS attacks and abuse.
configCard.rateLimitRequestsPerSecondHint: Maximum requests per second allowed per IP. Recommended: 10-100.
configCard.rateLimitBurstSizeHint: Token bucket capacity, allows burst requests in a short time. Recommended: 20-100.
configCard.rateLimitBanSecondsHint: Seconds to automatically ban after exceeding rate limit. 0 means no ban, only return 429 error. Recommended: 60-3600.
configCard.saveConfigFirst: Please save configuration first to generate rule ID
configCard.saveConfigFirstForRoute: Please save configuration first to generate rule/route ID
configCard.selectKeyFileFailed: Failed to select private key file: {error}
configCard.ruleListenAddrEmpty: Rule {index}: Listen address cannot be empty
configCard.ruleNoRoutes: Rule {index}: Please configure at least one route
configCard.routePathEmpty: Rule {ruleIndex} / Route {routeIndex}: Path cannot be empty (at least /)
configCard.routeNoUpstreamOrStatic: Rule {ruleIndex} / Route {routeIndex}: Please configure at least one upstream server address or static file directory
configCard.ruleSSLCertEmpty: Rule {index}: Certificate file and private key file cannot be empty when SSL is enabled
configCard.ruleBasicAuthEmpty: Rule {index}: Username and password cannot be empty when Basic Auth is enabled

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.updateHint: Updates every 2 seconds; subscribes and renders only when dashboard is active
dashboard.startTimeMustBeLess: Start time must be less than end time
dashboard.loadHistoricalSuccess: Historical data loaded successfully, {count} data points

wsProxy.title: WebSocket Reverse Proxy Configuration
wsProxy.selectKeyFileFailed: Failed to select private key file: {error}

streamProxy.title: Stream Proxy Configuration
streamProxy.description: Stream is Layer 4 (TCP/UDP) forwarding: listen port -> upstream. hash_key currently only supports $remote_addr (client IP). When consistent=true, enables consistent hash ring (closer to nginx: hash $remote_addr consistent).
streamProxy.noUpstreams: No upstreams yet, please add one first.
streamProxy.name: name
streamProxy.serverHint: Field description: addr=host:port; weight is not currently used in hash; max_fails/fail_timeout are used for TCP connection failure circuit breaking.
streamProxy.noServers: No servers yet, please add one first.

accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.switchHint: Controls whether access control (whitelist/blacklist) is enabled for the three types of reverse proxies. When disabled, requests of the corresponding type will be directly allowed.
accessControl.allowAllLANHint: When checked, all LAN addresses (e.g., 192.168.x.x, 10.x.x.x) will be allowed, and the whitelist will still be effective.
accessControl.dbNotEnabledHint: Blacklist feature requires data persistence to be enabled.
accessControl.goToStorage: Please go to the "Data Persistence" tab to enable database functionality.
accessControl.permanentHint: When checked, this IP will be permanently blacklisted
accessControl.dbNotEnabledMessage: Database not enabled! Please enable database functionality in the "Data Persistence" tab first.
accessControl.dbNotInitializedMessage: Database not initialized! Please check database configuration and path.
accessControl.expiresAtMustBeGreater: Expiration time must be greater than current time
accessControl.removeBlacklistConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove IP "{ip}" from blacklist?

metricsStorage.title: Data Persistence
metricsStorage.enableHint: When enabled, the system will periodically save metrics data to the database for viewing historical data
metricsStorage.dbPathPlaceholder: Leave empty to use default path: program directory/data/metrics.db
metricsStorage.dbPathHint: Leave empty to use default path. Supports absolute or relative paths
metricsStorage.dirStatus: Directory Status: Directory exists and is writable
metricsStorage.dirNotExists: Directory does not exist, please check if the path is correct, or create the directory manually
metricsStorage.dirNotWritable: Directory exists but has no write permission, please check directory permissions
metricsStorage.checkPathAndPermission: Please check path configuration and permission settings
metricsStorage.asyncWrite: Request logs use asynchronous writes and will not block proxy forwarding
metricsStorage.batchWrite: Writes are batched: up to 2000 entries accumulated or triggered every 5 seconds
metricsStorage.retention: Database retains request logs for the last 730 days, system checks daily and automatically cleans older data
metricsStorage.connectionPool: Database uses connection pool management, maximum 3 connections (SQLite)

requestLogs.title: Request Logs Query
requestLogs.startTimeMustBeLess: Start time must be less than end time
requestLogs.blacklistConfirm:
Are you sure you want to blacklist IP "{ip}"?
Default settings will be used: permanent blacklist
requestLogs.blacklistSuccess: IP {ip} has been added to blacklist (permanent)

logViewer.title: Realtime Access Logs
logViewer.noLogs: No logs yet, will display after service starts...
